description: This is a very simple application. You copy and paste a website URL into the top of the opening screen and then click on the Button 'Extract Images'. You are then able to use the Right and Left Arrows to navigate through them. However, there does not appear to be any way of saving the images to your hard-drive!
summary: This does extract images from a Web Site. But how do you save them?

description:
Installed it from snapcraft.io into KDE Neon distro.
The application seems to lack a way to enter the URL by pasting it. If this pasting function is not part of this application, it is practically useless. Manually input a simple, valid URL and the utility did nothing. Also, I was able to start it twice than after that it refuse to start. To many faults to blame it on the distro.
